channel.title: I can't spawn combat NPC's!
channel.description:
Ok, In my server I can spawn any npc with autospawn but i can't spawn combat npcs. I get this error: [code]Your server is now online and running! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 0 2270 4693 0 0 0 0" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1980) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:549) at server.main(server.java:112) [/code]
Im trying to spawn a KBD at his lair.
my autospawn looks like this: [code]spawn = 964 3213 3425 0 3215 3425 3211 3425 1
spawn = 599 3503 3577 0 0 0 0 0 1 He will change your looks.
spawn = 50 2270 4693 0 0 0 0 0 1
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST][/code]
there used to be combat npcs that worked, now i deleted them and they dont work. Help plz! Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 06:37:08 pm[/size][hr]i keep changing random stuff![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2009, 07:59:15 pm[/size][hr]still broken plz help!!

item.title: I can't spawn combat NPC's!
item.dc:creator: @sckum555 sckum555
item.description:
